opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Each party to pay own costs.

casebody.head_matter:
Shapiro v. Shapiro, Appellant.
Argued November 19, 1965.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.

January 17, 1966:
